ComicInfo.Summary:
With the future of the Mainstream at stake, Nate learns a dangerous secret that could change everything. Meanwhile, the Anti-Hodge and his acolytes make their move against the Keepers.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Talent Caldwell | 1 | B | Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 250 | Talent Caldwell | Missing | Note: The digital edition (7/25/2018) for this issue was released before the print edition.
